Gut Program The liver, gallbladder and pancreas are organs that we are not aware of unless they are causing symptoms. They all have dual functions-both part of the digestive system and the hormonal system. Here is a list of the related posts. The menu at the top of the page has links to the gut and hormone programs. Immune, Allergy & Infection Program Leukocytes are white blood cells, the part of blood system that are involved in immune system defense. When the blood test is high, it implies stimulation, usually with infection. Low leukocytes implies immune system supression, often from chemotherapy, but from other causes such as bone marrow dysfunction, toxicities, and other unknown causes. Specific types of white cells can be individually stimulated or suppressed. Gut Program Leaky Gut Syndrome is becoming a popular topic in the mainstream. It has been known about and utilized by holistic practitioners for almost 20 years. While it is helpful to treat leaky gut, the pitfall is that almost everyone these days has a certain degree of "leakiness" due to modern lifestyle. Antibiotics, certain vaccines, pesticides, and other toxins directly and indirectly (by changing gut ecology) cause leakiness. There is no direct or reliable way to measure leaky gut, other than by its clinical features, reviewed in the article (click on image).
